onboarding.getstarted: The secure peer-to-peer messaging app that works with or without internet access, cellular data or trust in the network

performance.title: Rendimiento
performance.desc: Fácil de usar - Todas las funciones

create-account.title: Create your account
create-account.desc: Un nombre es la única información requerida

generate-key.title: Starting the Berty node…
generate-key.desc: This might take a few seconds

notifications.header: No te pierdas un nuevo mensaje o solicitud de contacto
notifications.title: Notificaciones
notifications.desc: You need to authorize push notifications from Berty on your phone

bluetooth.header: Communicate whithout an internet connection (wifi or data) by connecting your phone directly with peers nearby
bluetooth.title: Bluetooth
bluetooth.desc: To use this feature you need to autorize the use of Bluetooth on your phone

setup-finished.title: ¡Configuración finalizada!
setup-finished.desc: You can now use the app, start adding contacts and talk freely and privately with them
